alert.note: Alert for Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 28 at 7:33AM EDT until July 28 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is ongoing. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Kentucky, including the following counties, Floyd, Knott, Letcher and Pike. * WHEN...Until 1245 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 731 AM EDT, Flooding is ongoing due to heavy rain that fell during the late night to early morning hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Hindman, Bath, Wheelwright, Fleming-Neon, Pippa Passes, Hall, Ivan, Greenleaf, Kite, Dry Creek, Omaha, Deane, Democrat, Halo, Drew, May, Topmost, Nealy, Hollybush and Lester.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
